title: Brave the Wild Trail
description: An alternative cover edition for this ISBN can be found here: Brave the Wild TrailTwelve-year-old Josh Bramlett and his family dream of buying ranch land. But before they do, they must sell their first herd cattle, and it is a very long and dangerous journey to market. Armed with eighteen-foot bullwhips that mark them as Florida Crackers, the Bramlett cattle drive follows a trail filled with wild animals, deadly insects, and dangerous outlaws.
author: Milly Howard
